Name: Charlotte: Dragon Slayer
About the game: About This Game Following the flow of the story to explore different lands. Make friends with interesting characters, encounter formidable enemies. Collecting rare equipments, building unique characters with a large database of hundred skills and equipments. Play as Charlotte, a female soldier of the Kingdom of Artolia. One day, a giant dragon appeared and threatened the peaceful life of her kingdom. It's not any dragon, but one of the legendary ones which has a size that is 5 times larger than regular dragons. An extremely tough but also exciting adventure is awaiting for you ahead! Key Features - Engaging, dramatic plot - Rich battle system - Hundreds of skills & equipments for you to freely customize your characters Games You May Like / /
